name: EVA 4 Dating Sim RPG
summary: All Anime fans know the underground series, Evangelion and its attractive characters. Now you'll have the opportunity to play the role of Shinji and win the heart of one of the characters. Day to day, your objective will be to improve your characteristics and earn money by beating the angels. When you talk with one of the girls, try not to say anything inappropriate, although you can try as many times as you like.
